## MarkdownBrowser variable

A component for rendering markdown that supports relative navigation. If you have a collection of markdown files (e.g., documentation), this component will render the content, but intercept link clicks to load relative content in the same pane.

External links will open in a new tab/window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MarkdownBrowser: React.FC<MarkdownBrowserProps>
```
